title: Windows 8.1 [G2] X86 12in1 OEM ESD en-US May 2015
description:
* Windows 8.1 [G2] X86 12in1 OEM ESD en-US May 2015


[ RELEASE INFO ]


* File: W81.X86.ESD.OEM.ENU.May2015.iso

* Sources: dvd 6051550 & dvd 6050710

* Size: 3,58GB
* Format: Bootable ISO

* CRC32: 2a280242
* MD5: 069f682329771fbf9a9ecebbb0a1f0a0
* SHA-1: 5a66c485bb90fa67cfc5899e5f8bef52624a2a2e

* Language: en-US [ English - USA ]

[ CONTENTS ]

* Integrated / Pre-installed in Audit Mode:

* .NET Framework 2.0, 3.0 & 3.5
* .NET Framework 4.5.2
* Important & Security Updates - 2015-05-12

* Setupcomplete / Post-install:

* KB890930
* Defender Updates

[ FEATURES ]

* Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 8.1 (Microsoft DaRT)
* install.wim compressed to recovery format (install.esd)

[ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]

* Windows 8.1 Core / KMS / OEM / OEM +
* Windows 8.1 Pro / KMS / OEM / OEM +
* Windows 8.1 Enterprise / KMS / OEM / OEM +

( KMS = Pre-Activated )
( OEM = Activation excludes manufacturers info etc )
( OEM + = Activation includes manufacturers info etc )

* OEM and OEM + (Original Equipment Manufacturer) will automatically activate
* if installing same version on original equipment.

* OEM + (if HP, Asus, Toshiba, etc), will input manufacturers login screen,
* wallpaper, system properties logo and User Account logo.

* Testing has shown that if you choose OEM for Custom Build, wallpaper,etc still
* gets applied but will NOT automatically activate.

[ COMMENTS & ACTIVATION INFO ]

* Activator: KMSpico v10.0.4 Portable Edition
* Potential False Positive Virus Alarm.

[ INSTALLATION & INFORMATION ]

* No upgrades, only clean installs.
* Create bootable USB (highly recommended) with Rufus,
* (attached) or burn to DVD at slow speed.

* Credits:
* milrob and stevie-boy for continued support and help with user questions.

* Hope you will enjoy this release!

* Regards,
* Generation2 @ KAT & TPB
